sentences.en: Always supremely confident extrovert, Mailer at times seemed like a publicity - seeking clown.
sentences.cn: 梅勒一直以来非常自信外向, 但是有时看起来会寻找外界的注意的小丑.

sentences.en: And banks are supremely skilled at exploiting any loopholes in the law.
sentences.cn: 而且银行非常擅于利用法律漏洞.

sentences.en: As a true transactional database, the order of each write is supremely important.
sentences.cn: 对于真实的事务数据库，每个写入的顺序极为重要。

sentences.en: But Christianity declares that God supremely revealed himself in Jesus.
sentences.cn: 然而,基督教宣告神至高的启示是在耶稣里.

sentences.en: I consider a supremely beautiful gesture.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这是非常优雅的姿态.

sentences.en: I think it ( the music score ) supremely beautiful!
sentences.cn: 我觉得它 ( 那个谱子 ) 非常地美!

sentences.en: Iris Murdoch was regarded by many as a supremely good and serious writer.
sentences.cn: 许多人都视艾丽丝·默多克为极其优秀和严肃的作家。

sentences.en: It is a delight in being with you, of a supremely delicate kind.
sentences.cn: 和你在一块儿, 本身就是一种快乐--这是一种极度优雅、美妙的快乐.

sentences.en: She gets on with her job and does it supremely well.
sentences.cn: 她继续她的工作，并且做得非常出色。

sentences.en: The party bubbled about them, and she sat listening, supremely content to be by his side.
sentences.cn: 周围人声鼎沸, 而她坐在那儿,安静地听他倾诉衷肠.

sentences.en: The power is infinite, the design supremely elegant.
sentences.cn: 力量是无穷的, 而设计的图案精美绝伦.

sentences.en: They managed it all supremely well.
sentences.cn: 这件事他们干得极其出色。

sentences.en: We are supremely confident because we have the right mixture of skill and experience.
sentences.cn: 我们有必备的技巧和经验，因此自信满满。

sentences.en: We say so even as atBoston's supremely's perpetually underrated Joe Johnson.
sentences.cn: 什么叫“乔约翰逊说他永远被低估啊”,没错是不必逐字逐句的严格对照, 但是 这么发挥根本是改了意思了啊.

words.tran_cn: 最高的；至高的；最重要的
